content: Top-level components ### This page Report a bug Show source if while for try with if else if test1: if test2: print(x) print() if x < y < z: print(x); print(y); print(z) compound_stmt ::= if_stmt | while_stmt | for_stmt | try_stmt | with_stmt | match_stmt | funcdef | classdef | async_with_stmt | async_for_stmt | async_funcdef suite ::= stmt_list NEWLINE | NEWLINE INDENT statement+ DEDENT statement ::= stmt_list NEWLINE | compound_stmt stmt_list ::= simple_stmt (";" simple_stmt)* [";"] if_stmt while_stmt for_stmt try_stmt with_stmt match_stmt funcdef classdef async_with_stmt async_for_stmt async_funcdef stmt_list statement stmt_list compound_stmt simple_stmt simple_stmt NEWLINE DEDENT else if if if if_stmt ::= "if" assignment_expression ":" suite ("elif" assignment_expression ":" suite)* ["else" ":" suite] assignment_expression suite assignment_expression suite suite if else while while while_stmt ::= "while" assignment_expression ":" suite ["else" ":" suite] assignment_expression suite suite else break else continue for for for_stmt ::= "for" target_list "in" starred_list ":" suite ["else" ":" suite] target_list suite suite starred_list else break else continue else for i in range(10): print(i) i = 5 # this will not affect the for-loop # because i will be overwritten with the next # index in the range range() range(3) try try try_stmt ::= try1_stmt | try2_stmt | try3_stmt try1_stmt ::= "try" ":" suite ("except" [expression ["as" identifier]] ":" suite)+ ["else" ":" suite] ["finally" ":" suite] try2_stmt ::= "try" ":" suite ("except" "*" expression ["as" identifier] ":" suite)+ ["else" ":" suite] ["finally" ":" suite] try3_stmt ::= "try" ":" suite "finally" ":" suite try1_stmt try2_stmt try3_stmt suite expression identifier suite suite suite suite expression identifier suite suite suite suite suite raise except except try try except except except except except except try except as except except except try try as target except except E as N: foo except E as N: try: foo finally: del N except except sys except sys. exception() sys >>> print(sys. exception()) None >>> try:. raise TypeError. except:. print(repr(sys. exception())). try:. raise ValueError.
title: 8. Compound statements.13.5
